Interface ISaveLocation

Represents a location where saves from emulators are to persist and be loaded across EmulatorTasks.

Namespace: Snowflake.Execution.Saving
Assembly: Snowflake.Framework.Primitives.dll
Syntax
public interface ISaveLocation

Properties

LastModified

Gets the date this save location was last persisted to.

Declaration
DateTimeOffset LastModified { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.DateTimeOffset

LocationGuid

Gets the GUID of this save location.

Declaration
Guid LocationGuid { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Guid

LocationRoot

Gets the root directory of this save location.

Declaration
DirectoryInfo LocationRoot { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.IO.DirectoryInfo

RecordGuid

Gets the game record guid of this save location

Declaration
Guid RecordGuid { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Guid

SaveFormat

Gets the format of this save file. Emulators that use the same save format can thus share saves.

Declaration
string SaveFormat { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

Methods

PersistFrom(DirectoryInfo)

Persists all files from the given directory and copies all files from the emulater save directory to the save location. Also updates the LastModified value.

Declaration
IEnumerable<FileInfo> PersistFrom(DirectoryInfo emulatorSaveDirectory)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.IO.DirectoryInfo emulatorSaveDirectory

The

Returns
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.IO.FileInfo>

The files that were copied

RetrieveTo(DirectoryInfo)

Retrieves the save files from the save location and copies save files to the emulator save directory.

Declaration
IEnumerable<FileInfo> RetrieveTo(DirectoryInfo emulatorSaveDirectory)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.IO.DirectoryInfo emulatorSaveDirectory

The directory that the emulator stores saves.
Returns
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.IO.FileInfo>

The files that were copied to the save directory
